mapper.update: update t_audit set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, type, user_id, status, submit_time, audit_time, memo, ref_id, create_time from t_audit
